text: Life with Father is a 1947 American comedy movie directed by Michael Curtiz and was based on the 1935 autobiographical novel and adapted from the 1939 play of the same name. It stars William Powell, Irene Dunne, Elizabeth Taylor, Edmund Glenn, Jimmy Lydon, ZaSu Pitts, Emma Dunn, Elisabeth Risdon and was distributed by Warner Bros.. It was nominated for 4 Academy Awards in 1948. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz
title: Life with Father (movie)
